title: Vice President and General Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at OPARC (Montclair, CA) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: Detailed process that used history of all applicants that were hired and successful to rate the potential for the applicant to to do well within the organization.  The process included a group interview followed up by a questionnaire that was the basis for the historical comparison to previous applicants and current employees..
Interview Questions: How would you handle yourself in a series of situations.
